text: A malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor (MPNST) is a form of cancer of the connective tissue surrounding peripheral nerves. It is classified as a sarcoma. About half the cases are diagnosed in people with neurofibromatosis. MPNST with rhabdomyoblastomatous component are called malignant triton tumors. ==References== Category:Cancer
title: Malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor
